trans-unit.source: Provides high-level access to the definition of a binding, which connects the properties of binding target objects (typically, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements), and any data source (for example, a database, an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] file, or any object that contains data).
trans-unit.target: 提供对绑定连接绑定目标对象的属性的定义的高级访问权限 (通常情况下，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素)，和任何数据源 (例如，一个数据库，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]文件或包含数据的任何对象)。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] data binding provides a simple and consistent way for applications to present and interact with data.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]数据绑定提供了简单的应用程序为与数据交互和呈现的一致方法。

trans-unit.source: Data binding enables you to synchronize the values of the properties of two different objects.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定可使你可以同步两个不同的对象的属性的值。

trans-unit.source: To establish a binding, use the Binding class or one of the other classes that inherit <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase>.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立一个绑定，使用的绑定类或某个其他类的继承<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase>

trans-unit.source: Regardless of what object you are binding and the nature of your data source, each binding follows the model illustrated by the following figure.
trans-unit.target: 你正在绑定而不考虑哪些对象和数据源的性质，每个绑定遵循以下图所示的模型。

trans-unit.source: ![Basic data binding diagram](~/add/media/databindingmostbasic.png "Basic data binding diagram") The figure demonstrates the following fundamental [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding concepts.
trans-unit.target: ![基本数据绑定示意图](~/add/media/databindingmostbasic.png "基本数据绑定示意图")图演示以下基本[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]数据绑定概念。

trans-unit.source: - Each binding typically has these four components: a binding target object, a target property, a binding source, and a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A> to the value in the binding source to use.
trans-unit.target: -每个绑定通常具有四个组件︰ 绑定目标对象、 目标属性、 绑定源和一个<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A>到要使用的绑定源中的值。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to bind the content of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> to the Name property of an Employee object, your target object is the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>, the target property is the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text%2A> property, the value to use is Name, and the source object is the Employee object.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要绑定的内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>Employee 对象的名称属性中，你的目标对象是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>，target 属性不<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text%2A>属性，要使用的值是名称，并且源对象是 Employee 对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: - The target property must be a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: -目标属性必须是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: This also means that you cannot bind a field.
trans-unit.target: 这也意味着你无法将的字段绑定。

trans-unit.source: Most properties of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects are dependency properties and most dependency properties, except read-only ones, support data binding by default.
trans-unit.target: 大部分属性<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>对象是依赖项属性，大多数依赖项属性，除了只读属性，默认情况下支持数据绑定。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: (Only <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> types can define dependency properties and all <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects derive from <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>.) - Although not specified in the figure, it should be noted that the binding source object is not restricted to being a custom [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] object.
trans-unit.target: （仅<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>类型可以定义依赖项属性和所有<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>对象都派生自<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>。） -尽管图中未指定，但应注意的是绑定源对象不限制为正在自定义[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]对象。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding supports data in the form of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] objects and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]数据绑定支持数据中的窗体[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]对象和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: To provide some examples, your binding source may be a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, any list object, a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] object that is associated with [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_adonet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-adonet-md.md)] data or Web Services, or an XmlNode that contains your [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供一些示例，您的绑定源可能是<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>，任何列表对象、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]与关联的对象[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_adonet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-adonet-md.md)]数据或 Web 服务或包含是 XmlNode 你[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Mode%2A> property to specify the direction of the data flow.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Mode%2A>属性来指定数据流的方向。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To detect source changes in one-way or two-way bindings, the source must implement a suitable property change notification mechanism such as <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 若要检测源更改中单向或双向绑定，源必须实现适当的属性更改通知机制，例如<xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Implement Property Change Notification](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参阅[如何︰ 实现属性更改通知](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> property specifies the timing of source updates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>属性指定的源更新的计时。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see "Basic Data Binding Concepts" in [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅"基本数据绑定概念"[数据绑定概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 添加的处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated>附加事件。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>侦听事件。

trans-unit.target: 要添加的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets opaque data passed to the asynchronous data dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置传递给异步数据调度程序的不透明数据。

trans-unit.source: Data passed to the asynchronous data dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: 数据传递给异步数据调度程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to evaluate the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path*> relative to the data item or the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否计算<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path*>相对于数据项或<xref href="System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path*>

trans-unit.source: The normal behavior (when this property is `false`) includes special treatment for <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider> objects.
trans-unit.target: 正常行为 (当此属性是`false`) 包括特殊处理的<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the binding engine evaluates the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A> relative to the object obtained from the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，绑定引擎的计算结果<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A>相对于获取从对象<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the binding listens for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DataChanged> event and reacts accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 此外，绑定还侦听<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DataChanged>事件并相应地作出反应。</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DataChanged>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `true` overrides this behavior and gives the binding access to properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider> object itself.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`true`重写此行为，并提供的属性绑定访问<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider>对象本身。</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to evaluate the path relative to the data item itself; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>若要计算的路径，相对于数据项然后重试。否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the converter to use.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要使用的转换器。

trans-unit.source: A binding implicitly uses a default converter that tries to do a type conversion between the source value and the target value.
trans-unit.target: 尝试执行类型转换，源值和目标值之间的默认转换器隐式使用的绑定。

trans-unit.source: If a conversion cannot be made, the default converter returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法进行转换，则默认转换器返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: If you want to associate a custom value converter with a binding, you should create a class that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter> interface and supply implementations for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要将自定义值转换器与绑定相关联，则应创建一个类以实现<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter>接口，并提供实现<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter>

trans-unit.source: Value converters can change data from one type to another, translate between cultural details such as character sets, or modify other aspects of their presentation.
trans-unit.target: 值转换器可以将数据从一种类型更改为另一个、 区域性的详细信息，例如字符集，之间进行转换或修改其表示形式的其他方面。

trans-unit.source: For examples of typical conversion scenarios, see "Data Conversion" in the [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关典型转换方案的示例，请参阅"数据转换"[数据绑定概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *myConverter* A resource reference to a class that implements the interface, which includes implementations of the and methods.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*myConverter*对实现的类的资源引用接口，包括的实现和方法。

trans-unit.source: To refer to a value converter, use the [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要引用的值转换器，请使用[否则标记扩展](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref href="System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 类型的值<xref href="System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture in which to evaluate the converter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置计算转换器要使用的区域性。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set this property, the binding engine uses the `Language` property of the binding target object.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，则绑定引擎会使用`Language`绑定目标对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] this defaults to "en-US" or inherits the value from the root element (or any element) of the page, if one has been explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]这默认为"EN-US"或从根元素 （或任何元素） 的页上，如果已显式设置了一个继承值。

trans-unit.source: For information about data conversion, see the Data Conversion section in the [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关数据转换的信息，请参阅中的数据转换部分[数据绑定概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the parameter to pass to the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter*>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要传递给<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter*>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter*>参数

trans-unit.source: You can use the ConverterParameter property to specify how an object is converted.
trans-unit.target: ConverterParameter 属性可用于指定如何将对象转换。

trans-unit.source: This property passes additional information to a converter that you use on a binding.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将其他信息传递给绑定使用的转换器。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a ConverterParameter, the value is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A> methods as the `parameter` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 当指定 ConverterParameter 时，将值传递到<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A>方法作为`parameter`参数。</xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Produce a Value Based on a List of Bound Items](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参阅[如何︰ 生成值基于绑定的项列表](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: That example shows an implementation of an <xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter> but the usage still applies.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示如何实现<xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter>但用法同样适用。</xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter>

trans-unit.source: The parameter to pass to the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter*>.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter*>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter*>参数

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Used as a returned value to instruct the binding engine not to perform any action.
trans-unit.target: 用作返回值以指示绑定引擎不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: A binding source property or a converter can return DoNothing to instruct the binding engine not to perform any action.
trans-unit.target: 绑定源属性或转换器可以返回 DoNothing 以指示绑定引擎不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: For example, to instruct the binding engine not to transfer a value to the binding target, not to move to the next <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> in a <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>, or not to use the `FallBackValue` or default value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要指示绑定引擎不传输到绑定目标，不能移动到下一个值<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>中<xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>，或不是使用`FallBackValue`或默认值。</xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the element to use as the binding source object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要用作绑定源对象的元素的名称。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when you want to bind to the property of another element in your application.
trans-unit.target: 当你想要将绑定到你的应用程序中的其他元素的属性时，此属性很有用。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> to control the height of another control in your application, or if you want to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of your control to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValue%2A> property of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>来控制应用程序中的另一个控件的高度或如果你想要绑定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>的控件与<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValue%2A>属性你<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: By default, bindings inherit the data context specified by the `DataContext` property, if one has been set.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，绑定继承指定的数据上下文`DataContext`属性，如果已设置完毕。

trans-unit.source: However, the ElementName property is one of the ways you can explicitly set the source of a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> and override the inherited data context.
trans-unit.target: 但是，ElementName 属性是一种你可以显式设置的源的<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>和重写继承的数据上下文。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Specify the Binding Source](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 指定绑定源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> class also enable you to set the source of the binding explicitly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>类还使你能够设置绑定源显式。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, only one of the three properties, ElementName, <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A>, should be set for each binding, or a conflict might occur.
trans-unit.target: 但是，只有一个三个属性，ElementName， <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A>、 都应该为每个集绑定，或可能出现冲突。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property throws an exception if there is a binding source conflict.
trans-unit.target: 如果绑定源冲突，此属性将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> property or [x:Name Directive](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) of the element of interest.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref>属性或[X:name 指令](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)感兴趣的元素。

trans-unit.target: 您可以参考代码中的元素，仅当它们注册到适当<xref:System.Windows.NameScope>通过<xref uid="langword_csharp_RegisterName" name="RegisterName" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.NameScope>

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[WPF XAML Namescopes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] namespace manager object used by the binding attached to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 返回[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]被附加到指定的对象的绑定所使用的命名空间管理器对象。

trans-unit.source: This method supports attached property usage for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XmlNamespaceManager%2A> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法支持的附加的属性使用情况<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XmlNamespaceManager%2A>附加属性。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XmlNamespaceManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] namespace managers are relevant only if the data in the binding came from an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] binding source (<xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> object).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]命名空间管理器是仅当在绑定中的数据的来源时，才相关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]绑定源 (<xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>

trans-unit.source: If a namespace manager was not specifically applied either in the original data source creation or by subsequently calling <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SetXmlNamespaceManager%2A> on the binding, then this method will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果命名空间管理器在原始数据源创建或通过随后调用未专门应用<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SetXmlNamespaceManager%2A>上绑定，则此方法将返回`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SetXmlNamespaceManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method will always return `null` if the data behind the binding is not [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此方法将始终返回`null`如果在绑定后面的数据不[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> should get and set values asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref>应异步获取和设置值。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsAsync property when the `get` accessor of your binding source property might take a long time.
trans-unit.target: 使用 IsAsync 属性时`get`你绑定源属性的访问器可能需要很长时间。

trans-unit.source: One example is an image property with a `get` accessor that downloads from the Web.
trans-unit.target: 一个示例是与图像属性`get`从 Web 下载的访问器。

trans-unit.source: Setting IsAsync to `true` avoids blocking the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] while the download occurs.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 IsAsync`true`可避免阻止[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]时进行下载。

trans-unit.source: While waiting for the value to arrive, the binding reports the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue%2A>, if one is available, or the default value of the binding target property.
trans-unit.target: 在等待要到达的值，该绑定报告<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue%2A>，如果有的话，或默认值的绑定目标属性。</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, there should not be many scenarios where you need to use the IsAsync property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不应存在很多情况下，你需要使用 IsAsync 属性。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_net](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-net-md.md)] guidelines recommend against defining properties that are orders of magnitude slower than a field set would be.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_net](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-net-md.md)]准则建议您定义个数量级慢于字段集的属性。

trans-unit.source: When you are creating your class, consider handling extremely slow operations outside of the `get` accessor and caching the result.
trans-unit.target: 当创建你的类时，请考虑处理速度极慢操作之外`get`访问器和缓存结果。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Choosing Between Properties and Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/55825e8f-7e2e-448a-9505-7217cc91b1af).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 选择之间属性和方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/55825e8f-7e2e-448a-9505-7217cc91b1af)。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the direction of the data flow in the binding.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在绑定中数据流的方向。

trans-unit.source: To support <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode> bindings, the underlying data must implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 若要支持<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode>基础数据的绑定必须实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode>

trans-unit.source: For details, see [How to: Implement Property Change Notification](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 实现属性更改通知](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode> bindings, you can control the target-to-source updates by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode>或<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode>绑定，可以通过设置来控制目标到源更新<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different binding modes, see [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关不同的绑定模式的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingMode"></xref>, which returns the default binding mode value of the target dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingMode"> </xref>，它返回目标依赖属性的默认绑定模式值。

trans-unit.source: However, the default value varies for each dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，默认值都不同每个依赖属性。

trans-unit.source: In general, user-editable control properties, such as those of text boxes and check boxes, default to two-way bindings, whereas most other properties default to one-way bindings.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，用户可编辑的控件属性，如文本框和复选框，默认为双向绑定，而其他大多数属性默认为单向绑定。

trans-unit.source: A programmatic way to determine whether a dependency property binds one-way or two-way by default is to get the property metadata of the property using <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.GetMetadata*> and then check the Boolean value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.BindsTwoWayByDefault*> property.
trans-unit.target: 确定依赖属性默认情况下是否绑定单向或双向的编程方法是获取的属性使用的属性元数据<> *1>，然后检查的布尔值<> *1> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SourceUpdated> event when a value is transferred from the binding target to the binding source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否引发<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SourceUpdated>当一个值从绑定目标传输到绑定源的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SourceUpdated>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SourceUpdated> event should be raised when the binding source value is updated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SourceUpdated>时绑定源值更新; 否则为应引发事件<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SourceUpdated>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated> event when a value is transferred from the binding source to the binding target.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否引发<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated>当一个值从绑定源传输到绑定目标的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated> event should be raised when the binding target value is updated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated>更新; 否则为绑定目标值时，应引发事件<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error> attached event on the bound object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error>附加对绑定对象的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error>

trans-unit.source: If the binding has <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> associated with it, the binding engine checks each rule each time it transfers the target property value to the source property.
trans-unit.target: 如果绑定具有<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>与它关联，则绑定引擎将检查每个规则每次传输的目标属性值与源属性。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a rule invalidates a value, the binding engine creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError> object and adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation>.<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A> collection of the bound object.
trans-unit.target: 如果规则将使值无效，绑定引擎创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError>对象，并将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation>。<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A>的绑定对象的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is not empty, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError%2A?displayProperty=fullName> attached property of the object is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性不为空，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError%2A?displayProperty=fullName>附加的属性的对象设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the NotifyOnValidationError property of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> is set to `true`, then the binding engine raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=fullName> attached event on the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果的 NotifyOnValidationError 属性<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>设置为`true`，然后绑定引擎将引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=fullName>附加对象上的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>

trans-unit.source: For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see the Data Validation section in the [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 验证过程的详细讨论，请参阅中的数据验证部分[数据绑定概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error> attached event should be raised on the bound object when there is a validation error during source updates; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error>附加的事件应在源更新过程中存在验证错误时对绑定对象引发; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to the binding source property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置绑定源属性的路径。

trans-unit.source: Each binding typically has these four components: a binding target object, a target property, a binding source, and a path to the value in the binding source to use.
trans-unit.target: 每个绑定通常具有四个组件︰ 绑定目标对象、 目标属性、 绑定源和要使用的绑定源中的值的路径。

trans-unit.source: For more information about these data binding concepts, see [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关这些数据绑定概念的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Use the Path property to specify the source value you want to bind to: - In the simplest case, the Path property value is the name of the property of the source object to use for the binding, such as `Path=PropertyName`.
trans-unit.target: 路径属性用于指定你想要将绑定到源值:-在简单的情况下，属性值是要使用的绑定，如的源对象的属性的名称的路径`Path=PropertyName`。

trans-unit.source: - Subproperties of a property can be specified by a syntax similar to that used in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_cshrp](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-cshrp-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 的可以通过类似于在中使用的语法指定子属性的属性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_cshrp](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-cshrp-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For instance, the clause `Path=ShoppingCart.Order` sets the binding to the subproperty `Order` of the object or property `ShoppingCart`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，子句`Path=ShoppingCart.Order`子属性设置的绑定`Order`对象或属性的`ShoppingCart`。

trans-unit.source: - To bind to an attached property, place parentheses around the attached property.
trans-unit.target: -若要将绑定到附加的属性，将附加属性旁的括号。

trans-unit.source: For example, to bind to the attached property <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel.Dock%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, the syntax is `Path=(DockPanel.Dock)`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要将绑定到附加的属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel.Dock%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，语法是`Path=(DockPanel.Dock)`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel.Dock%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - Indexers of a property can be specified within square brackets following the property name where the indexer is applied.
trans-unit.target: 的可以在属性名称后面的索引器应用的位置的方括号中指定索引器的属性。

trans-unit.source: For instance, the clause `Path=ShoppingCart[0]` sets the binding to the index that corresponds to how your property's internal indexing handles the literal string "0".
trans-unit.target: 例如，子句`Path=ShoppingCart[0]`对应于属性的内部索引如何处理文字字符串"0"的索引中设置的绑定。

trans-unit.source: Multiple indexers are also supported.
trans-unit.target: 此外支持多个索引器。

trans-unit.source: - Indexers and subproperties can be mixed in a `Path` clause; for example, `Path=ShoppingCart.ShippingInfo[MailingAddress,Street].` - Inside indexers you can have multiple indexer parameters separated by commas (,).
trans-unit.target: 的可以在混合索引器和子属性`Path`子句; 例如， `Path=ShoppingCart.ShippingInfo[MailingAddress,Street].` -在你可以用逗号 （，） 分隔的多个索引器参数的索引器内部。

trans-unit.source: The type of each parameter can be specified with parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用括号指定每个参数的类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can have `Path="[(sys:Int32)42,(sys:Int32)24]"`, where `sys` is mapped to the `System` namespace.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以`Path="[(sys:Int32)42,(sys:Int32)24]"`，其中`sys`映射到`System`命名空间。

trans-unit.source: - When the source is a collection view, the current item can be specified with a slash (/).
trans-unit.target: -当源是集合视图，可以使用斜杠 （/） 指定的当前项。

trans-unit.source: For example, the clause `Path=/` sets the binding to the current item in the view.
trans-unit.target: 例如，子句`Path=/`到视图中的当前项设置的绑定。

trans-unit.source: When the source is a collection, this syntax specifies the current item of the default collection view.
trans-unit.target: 集合源时，此语法指定的默认集合视图的当前项。

trans-unit.source: - Property names and slashes can be combined to traverse properties that are collections.
trans-unit.target: 的可以组合属性名称、 斜杠遍历是集合的属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, `Path=/Offices/ManagerName` specifies the current item of the source collection, which contains an `Offices` property that is also a collection.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Path=/Offices/ManagerName`指定源集合，其中包含的当前项`Offices`也是集合的属性。

trans-unit.source: Its current item is an object that contains a `ManagerName` property.
trans-unit.target: 其当前项是一个对象，包含`ManagerName`属性。

trans-unit.source: - Optionally, a period (.) path can be used to bind to the current source.
trans-unit.target: -（可选） 可以使用句点 （.） 路径将绑定到当前的源。

trans-unit.source: For example, `Text="{Binding}"` is equivalent to `Text="{Binding Path=.}"`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Text="{Binding}"`等效于`Text="{Binding Path=.}"`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the binding source by specifying its location relative to the position of the binding target.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置绑定源通过指定相对于绑定目标位置的位置。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to bind one property of an object to another property of the same object, or to define a binding in a style or template.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是通常用于将对象的一个属性绑定到的同一个对象，另一个属性，或用于在样式或模板中定义绑定。

trans-unit.source: By default, bindings inherit the data context specified by the `DataContext` property, if one has been set.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，绑定继承指定的数据上下文`DataContext`属性，如果已设置完毕。

trans-unit.source: However, the RelativeSource property is one of the ways you can explicitly set the source of a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> and override the inherited data context.
trans-unit.target: 但是，RelativeSource 属性是一种你可以显式设置的源的<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>和重写继承的数据上下文。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 指定绑定源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties also enable you to set the source of the binding explicitly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性还允许你设置的绑定源显式。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, only one of the three properties, <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>, and RelativeSource, should be set for each binding, or a conflict can occur.
trans-unit.target: 但是，只有一个三个属性， <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>，和 RelativeSource，应设置为每个绑定，或可能发生冲突。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property throws an exception if there is a binding source conflict.
trans-unit.target: 如果绑定源冲突，此属性将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object to use as the binding source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要用作绑定源的对象。

trans-unit.source: By default, bindings inherit the data context specified by the `DataContext` property, if one has been set.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，绑定继承指定的数据上下文`DataContext`属性，如果已设置完毕。

trans-unit.source: However, the Source property is one of the ways you can explicitly set the source of a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> and override the inherited data context.
trans-unit.target: 但是，源属性是一种你可以显式设置的源的<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>和重写继承的数据上下文。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>

trans-unit.source: If you do not need the functionality of establishing a scope in which several properties inherit the same data context, you can use the Source property instead of the `DataContext` property.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要建立多个属性在其继承相同的数据上下文的作用域的功能，你可以使用源属性而不是`DataContext`属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties also enable you to set the source of the binding explicitly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性还允许你设置的绑定源显式。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, only one of the three properties, <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A>, Source, and <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A>, should be set for each binding, or a conflict can occur.
trans-unit.target: 但是，只有一个三个属性， <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A>，源和<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A>、 都应该为每个集绑定，或可能发生冲突。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property throws an exception if there is a binding source conflict.
trans-unit.target: 如果绑定源冲突，此属性将引发异常。

trans-unit.target: 要用作绑定源的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a handler you can use to provide custom logic for handling exceptions that the binding engine encounters during the update of the binding source value.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个处理程序可以使用提供的自定义逻辑处理绑定引擎遇到的绑定源值更新过程中的异常。

trans-unit.source: This is only applicable if you have associated an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule"></xref> with your binding.
trans-unit.target: 此特性仅适用如果关联<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule"></xref>与绑定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule> is a built-in validation rule that checks for exceptions thrown during the update of the binding source property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>是内置的验证规则，用于检查的绑定源属性更新过程中引发的异常。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: If you have associated the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule> with your <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> object, you can use this property to set a handler to provide custom logic for handling these exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 如果关联<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>与你<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>对象，你可以使用此属性设置要用于处理这些异常中提供自定义逻辑的处理程序。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: If an UpdateSourceExceptionFilter is not specified on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>, the binding engine creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError> with the exception and adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection of the bound element.
trans-unit.target: 如果在未指定 UpdateSourceExceptionFilter <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>，该绑定引擎创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError>出现异常并将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>绑定元素的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>

trans-unit.source: A method that provides custom logic for handling exceptions that the binding engine encounters during the update of the binding source value.
trans-unit.target: 提供自定义逻辑以处理绑定引擎遇到的绑定源值更新过程中的异常的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines the timing of binding source updates.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，确定绑定源更新的计时。

trans-unit.source: Bindings that are <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode> listen for changes in the target property and propagate them back to the source.
trans-unit.target: 绑定<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode>或<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode>侦听中的目标属性的更改并将它们传播回源。</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode>

trans-unit.source: This is known as updating the source.
trans-unit.target: 这称为更新源。

trans-unit.source: Usually, these updates happen whenever the target property changes.
trans-unit.target: 通常，当目标属性发生更改时，可能发生这些更新。

trans-unit.source: This is fine for check boxes and other simple controls, but it is usually not appropriate for text fields.
trans-unit.target: 这是特别适用于的复选框和其他简单控件，但它不是通常适用于文本字段。

trans-unit.source: Updating after every keystroke can diminish performance and it denies the user the usual opportunity to backspace and fix typing errors before committing to the new value.
trans-unit.target: 更新后每次按键可能导致性能降低并拒绝用户进行此种常用的机会来退格键并在为新值提交之前修复键入错误。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the default UpdateSourceTrigger value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger> and not <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，默认 UpdateSourceTrigger 值的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text%2A>属性是<xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger>和 not <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger> </xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the UpdateSourceTrigger value to <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger>, you must call the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression.UpdateSource%2A> method or the changes will not propagate back to the source.
trans-unit.target: 如果 UpdateSourceTrigger 值设置为<xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger>，必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression.UpdateSource%2A>方法或所做的更改将不会传播回源。</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression.UpdateSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger"></xref>, which returns the default <xref href="System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger"></xref> value of the target dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger"> </xref>，这将返回默认值<xref href="System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger"></xref>目标依赖项属性的值。

trans-unit.source: However, the default value for most dependency properties is <xref href="System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger"></xref>, while the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text*> property has a default value of <xref href="System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger"></xref>. A programmatic way to determine the default UpdateSourceTrigger value of a dependency property is to get the property metadata of the property using <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.GetMetadata*> and then check the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.DefaultUpdateSourceTrigger*> property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，大多数依赖项属性的默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger"> </xref>，虽然<> *1> 属性具有默认值为<xref href="System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger"> </xref>。 确定依赖项属性的默认 UpdateSourceTrigger 值的编程方法是获取的属性使用的属性元数据<> *1>，然后检查的值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.DefaultUpdateSourceTrigger*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.DefaultUpdateSourceTrigger*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否包含<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property provides an alternative to using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule> element explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性，可以使用的替代方法<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule>元素显式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule> is a built-in validation rule that checks for errors that are raised by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo> implementation of the source object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule>是内置的验证规则，可通过引发的错误检查<xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo>源对象的实现。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: If an error is raised, the binding engine creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError> with the error and adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection of the bound element.
trans-unit.target: 如果引发错误，则绑定引擎创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError>出现错误并将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>绑定元素的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError>

trans-unit.source: The lack of an error clears this validation feedback, unless another rule raises a validation issue.
trans-unit.target: 错误缺乏清除此验证反馈，除非另一个规则会生成验证问题。

trans-unit.source: ValidatesOnDataErrors is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: ValidatesOnDataErrors 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [.NET Framework Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 版本和依赖关系](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要包括<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule"> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否包含<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property provides an alternative to using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule> element explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性，可以使用的替代方法<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>元素显式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule> is a built-in validation rule that checks for exceptions that are thrown during the update of the source property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>是内置的验证规则，用于检查的源属性更新过程中引发的异常。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown, the binding engine creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError> with the exception and adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection of the bound element.
trans-unit.target: 如果引发异常，则绑定引擎创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError>出现异常并将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>绑定元素的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError>

trans-unit.source: The lack of an error clears this validation feedback, unless another rule raises a validation issue.
trans-unit.target: 错误缺乏清除此验证反馈，除非另一个规则会生成验证问题。

trans-unit.source: ValidatesOnExceptions is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: ValidatesOnExceptions 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [.NET Framework Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 版本和依赖关系](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要包括<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule"> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.NotifyDataErrorValidationRule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否包含<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.NotifyDataErrorValidationRule"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When ValidatesOnNotifyDataErrors is `true`, the binding checks for and reports errors that are raised by a data source that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo>.
trans-unit.target: ValidatesOnNotifyDataErrors 时`true`的绑定来查看和报告由实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo>的数据源引发的错误

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.NotifyDataErrorValidationRule"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要包括<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.NotifyDataErrorValidationRule"> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of rules that check the validity of the user input.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于检查用户输入有效性的规则的集合。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate ValidationRules with your <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> object.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]数据绑定模型使您可以将相关联 Validationrule 与你<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>或<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>

trans-unit.source: You can create custom rules by deriving from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> class and implementing the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> method, or you can use the built-in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>, which invalidates a value if there are exceptions during source updates.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过从派生创建自定义规则<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>类并实现<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A>方法，或者可以使用内置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>，这使无效值，如果在源更新过程中出现异常。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: The binding engine checks each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> associated with a binding each time an input value (the binding target property value) is transferred to the binding source property.
trans-unit.target: 绑定引擎将检查每个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>每次输入的值 （绑定目标属性值） 传输到绑定源属性的绑定相关联。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see the Data Validation section in the [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 验证过程的详细讨论，请参阅中的数据验证部分[数据绑定概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property can be set in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] only by using the collection syntax shown, or by accessing the collection object and using its various methods, such as `Add`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 可以设置此属性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]只能由使用集合语法所示，或者通过访问的集合对象，并使用它的各种方法，如`Add`。

trans-unit.source: The property to access the collection object is read-only, whereas the collection itself is read-write.
trans-unit.target: 要访问的集合对象的属性是只读的而集合本身是可读写。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMoreValidationRules* One or more objects.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性元素用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*oneOrMoreValidationRules*一个或多个对象。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule> class or create custom rules by subclassing the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> class.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>类或创建自定义规则通过子类化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>类。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XmlNamespaceManager*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XmlNamespaceManager*>附加属性。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XmlNamespaceManager*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref uid="langword_csharp_XPath" name="XPath" href=""></xref> query that returns the value on the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] binding source to use.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref uid="langword_csharp_XPath" name="XPath" href=""></xref>返回的值的查询[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]要使用的绑定源。

trans-unit.source: When the binding source is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data instead of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object, the XPath property is used instead of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A> property to indicate the path to the value on the binding source to use.
trans-unit.target: 绑定源时[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]数据而不是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]对象，而不是使用 XPath 属性<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A>属性以指示要使用的绑定源上的值的路径。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A>

trans-unit.source: By setting the XPath property, you are creating an `XPath` query to select a node or a collection of nodes (<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> both derive from <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode?displayProperty=fullName>).
trans-unit.target: 通过将 XPath 属性设置，你将创建`XPath`查询，以便选择的节点的集合 (<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>都派生自<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode?displayProperty=fullName>)。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.XmlElement?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode?displayProperty=fullName> is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object, which means you can bind to its properties using the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode?displayProperty=fullName>是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]对象，这意味着你可以将绑定到使用其属性<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A></xref:System.Xml.XmlNode?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method handles the `XPath` expressions from the XPath property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法将处理`XPath`XPath 属性中的表达式。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: `XPath` functions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: `XPath`不支持函数。

trans-unit.source: For `XPath` expression information, see the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A> documentation and some examples provided in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: 有关`XPath`表达式的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A>文档和示例部分中提供一些示例。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: LINQ to XML objects <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument> and <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> do not use `XPath`.
trans-unit.target: 对 XML 对象的 LINQ<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>和<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>不使用`XPath`。</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>

trans-unit.source: For details, see [How to: Bind to XDocument, XElement, or LINQ for XML Query Results](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 为 XML 查询结果绑定到 XDocument、 XElement 或 LINQ](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XPath" name="XPath" href=""></xref> query.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_XPath" name="XPath" href=""> </xref>查询。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。
